intro.p: Interface that should be implemented by any component that wishes to be referenced as interceptor.

note.p: This interface will be replaced by IInterceptor

section.title: Intercept(IMethodInvocation invocation, Object[] args) : Object
section.p: Method invoked by the proxy in order to allow the interceptor to do its work before and after the actual invocation.

tr.td: The invocation holds the details of this interception
